text: The State Statistics Committee of Azerbaijan Republic () is a governmental agency within the Cabinet of Azerbaijan in charge of collection, processing and publishing statistical data on the economy, demographics and other sectors in the Republic of Azerbaijan. The State Statistics Committee was established on February 18, 1994 by President Heydar Aliyev. Its headquarters is located in the Azerbaijani capital city of Baku. ==Related pages== * Statistics * Azerbaijan == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Government agencies Category:1994 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Azerbaijan Category:Statistics organizations Category:Organizations based in Azerbaijan
title: State Statistics Committee
